chapter.title: X3J13 Issue Index [CLHS-ic]
chapter.para: This is the list of ANSI CL issues and their current status in &clisp;, i.e., whether &clisp; supports code that makes use of the functionality specified by the vote.

listitem.simpara: yes, except for argument list checking in &call-next-method; in compiled code (items 11,12)
yes for &the;, no for &apply; (spec not clear)
yes, when &count-ansi; is non-&nil;; otherwise negative &count-k; values are not allowed.
yes, except that &read-delimited-list; still constructs a &list-t;
